dict.string: This template provides a starting point for an application with iOS department preferrable project structure

stages: - test - build
variables: XCODE_BUILD_DIR: "build" XCODE_IPA_DIR: "ipa"
before_script: - rm -rf "${XCODE_BUILD_DIR}"
# =================================== # TEMPLATES # ===================================
.test_template: &test_template script: - pod install --deployment --repo-update - xcodebuild -workspace "${WORKSPACE}" -scheme "${SCHEME}" clean -quiet - xcodebuild -workspace "${WORKSPACE}" -scheme "${SCHEME}" -destination "${TEST_PLATFORM}" build-for-testing -quiet - xcodebuild -workspace "${WORKSPACE}" -scheme "${SCHEME}" -destination "${TEST_PLATFORM}" test-without-building -enableCodeCoverage YES -resultBundlePath "${XCODE_BUILD_DIR}/${SCHEME}.xcresult" artifacts: paths: - "${XCODE_BUILD_DIR}/${SCHEME}.xcresult" tags: - xcode11
.archive_template: &archive_template script: - git remote set-url origin git@${CI_SERVER_HOST}:${CI_PROJECT_PATH}.git - pod install --deployment --repo-update --silent - "${BUMP_BUILD_SCRIPT_PATH}" - xcodebuild -workspace "${WORKSPACE}" -scheme "${SCHEME}" clean - xcodebuild -workspace "${WORKSPACE}" -scheme "${SCHEME}" archive -archivePath "${XCODE_BUILD_DIR}/${SCHEME}" -allowProvisioningUpdates -quiet - xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath "${XCODE_BUILD_DIR}/${SCHEME}.xcarchive" -exportPath "${XCODE_IPA_DIR}" -exportOptionsPlist "${EXPORT_OPTIONS_PATH}" - "${PUSH_BUILD_SCRIPT_PATH}" variables: &archive_template_vars TARGET_BRANCH: "${CI_COMMIT_REF_NAME}" BUMP_BUILD_SCRIPT_PATH: "bump-build-number.sh" PUSH_BUILD_SCRIPT_PATH: "push-build-number.sh" artifacts: paths: - "${XCODE_IPA_DIR}" except: variables: - $CI_COMMIT_MESSAGE =~ /\[(.*?) build [0-9]+\]/ tags: - xcode11
# =================================== # ===================================
test: <<: *test_template stage: test variables: TEST_PLATFORM: "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 11" WORKSPACE: "___PACKAGENAME___.xcworkspace" SCHEME: "___PACKAGENAME___" only: - merge_requests
archive: <<: *archive_template stage: build variables: &archive_template_vars TARGET_DIR: "${CI_PROJECT_DIR}" WORKSPACE: "___PACKAGENAME___.xcworkspace" SCHEME: "___PACKAGENAME___" EXPORT_OPTIONS_PATH: "ExportOptions-___PACKAGENAME___.plist" only: - develop
